message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us and has the potential to revolutionize your business. We understand its significance to you, valued at $1500000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special price of $1250000. This represents an opportunity for both parties to benefit significantly. We believe this price reflects the true value while allowing you to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
